mapper.select: select gugun_code, gugun_name,sido_code from gugun where sido_code = #{sidoCode}
select content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image,first_image2,readcount,latitude,longitude,mlevel from attraction_info where title like concat('%',#{title},'%')

SELECT content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image,first_image2,readcount,latitude,longitude,mlevel FROM attraction_info WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') and content_type_id in (12) ORDER BY ST_DISTANCE_Sphere(POINT(longitude, latitude), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude})) LIMIT 6;
select overview from attraction_description where content_id=#{contentId};
